Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Howard
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Howard due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Howard due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
